mapper.insert: insert into WDSJJLB (WDBH, WDBB, WDBT, GJZ, WDZY, WDWZ, WDLX, WDZZ, ZZDW, ZYWZ, TJSJ, XGSJ, WDNR) values (#{wdbh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wdbb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wdbt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdzy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdwz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{wdlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wdzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zywz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wdnr,jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.update: update WDSJJLB set WDBB = #{wdbb,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WDBT = #{wdbt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GJZ = #{gjz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WDZY = #{wdzy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WDWZ = #{wdwz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WDLX = #{wdlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WDZZ = #{wdzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZDW = #{zzdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZYWZ = #{zywz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TJSJ = #{tjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGSJ = #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WDNR = #{wdnr,jdbcType=CLOB} where WDBH = #{wdbh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select WDBH, WDBB, WDBT, GJZ, WDZY, WDWZ, WDLX, WDZZ, ZZDW, ZYWZ, TJSJ, XGSJ, WDNR from WDSJJLB
